Russian FAB glide-bombs continue to pound the encircled Ukrainian garrison in the city of Myrnohrad. 
This video shows a FAB-3000 strike.

Overnight, Russian Geran-2 drones once again targeted the town of Vasylkivka, Dnipropetrovsk Oblast. 
Vasylkivka has come under attack from Gerans almost every day for the last two weeks. The town hosts a railway station, and is a key logistical hub for the Prosyana and Pokrovsk'e directions.

Overnight, Russian Geran-2 drones once again targeted the town of Vasylkivka, Dnipropetrovsk Oblast. 
Vasylkivka has come under attack from Gerans almost every day for the last two weeks. The town hosts a railway station, and is a key logistical hub for the Prosyana and Pokrovsk'e directions.

During the day, the IDF carried out a targeted assassination strike on the Hezbollah chief of staff in the southern suburbs of Beirut.
The strike was successful, killing him along with 4 other Hezbollah members. The U.S. was reportedly not notified in advance.
Full text of the European counter-proposal to the US peace plan
Full text of the European counter-proposal to the US peace plan

Current status of the remaining Raions (Districts) of Donetsk Oblast with a Ukrainian presence:
Kramatorsk Raion: 3,803 km¬≤ (73.3% of total district)
Pokrovsk Raion: 1,020 km¬≤ (25.4% of total district)
Bakhmut Raion: 236 km¬≤ (13.5% of total district)
Volnovakha Raion: 18 km¬≤ (0.4% of total district)
With Pokrovsk City now under full Russian control, only one district capital of Donetsk Oblast remains under Ukrainian control.

Russian forces have now physically cut off the remaining Ukrainian garrison in the city of Myrnohrad.
This is mainly symbolic, however, as it's likely that no movement in and out of that pocket has occurred for weeks.

Russian forces have recaptured the village of Hai, Pokrovsk'e direction, Dnipropetrovsk Oblast.
Pre-war population: 28.
Total land area: ~0.36 km¬≤.
The 2nd battle for this village lasted approximately 2 days.

Russian forces have captured the village of Vidradne, Pokrovsk'e direction, Dnipropetrovsk Oblast.
Pre-war population: ~166.
Total land area: ~0.65 km¬≤. 
The fighting for Vidradne lasted approximately 4 days.

Russian forces have re-established control over the village of Oleksiivka, Khotin direction, Sumy Oblast.
Pre-war population: ~547.
Total land area: ~2.20 km¬≤.
The 2nd battle for Oleksiivka lasted approximately 4 months, 16 days.

For all those saying I'm a psyop account living in Russia 
üòÅ

Everyone is freaking out about the new twitter location feature, and now my timeline is 90% posts about this. 
This is why you don't lie about where you live lmao.

First round of negotiations between  Ukrainian and American delegations was indeed quite tense.
During one of these ‚Äúheated‚Äù discussions, Umerov even broke his pen.

First round of negotiations between  Ukrainian and American delegations was indeed quite tense.
During one of these ‚Äúheated‚Äù discussions, Umerov even broke his pen.

During the day, the IDF carried out a targeted assassination strike on the Hezbollah chief of staff in the southern suburbs of Beirut.  The strike was successful, killing him along with 4 other Hezbollah members. The U.S. was reportedly not notified in advance.

Israeli surface-to-air missile systems in northern Israel have been placed on high alert due to the threat of Hezbollah rocket launches from Lebanon in retaliation for the IDF assassination strike on the Hezbollah Chief of staff.

In the Stepnohirsk direction, Russian forces continued their assault operations, making new progress in two different areas.
In the east, Russian forces advanced further north along the E-105 Highway to Zaporizhzhia City where they captured additional positions in the Kollektivnyye Dachas, reaching its northeastern edge. They then infiltrated further north along the highway and reached the irrigation reservoir, where they are attempting to consolidate in the buildings there. Additionally, the Russians continued their assault operations in the western part of the Kollektivnyye Dachas, as well as on the Ogorody Dachas, so far without any confirmed advances.
In the west, Russian forces continued making incremental progress in Prymorske. They advanced further north through the southern residential areas, and reached the first gulley at Dachna Street, where new positions were captured. From there, they pushed further north and consolidated positions south of Stadionna Street, while DRGs penetrated towards the second gulley and the abandoned industrial buildings on its eastern outskirts. 
+ ~1.04 km¬≤ in favour of Russia.

In the Orikhiv direction, Russian forces continued their assault operations on the village of Novodanylivka and have made important progress.
Russian forces advanced further north from their positions south of Novodanylivka, capturing new positions in the forested areas and reaching its southern outskirts. From there, they continued infiltrating the southern part of the village, attempting to coordinate with soldiers already in the village from earlier attacks. As a result, they were able to cross the H-08 Highway and consolidate in the grey-zone in the southern houses and have since begun pushing further north into the centre. 
Meanwhile, clashes continue in Mala Tokmachka. Despite claims by Russian sources, Russian forces are still yet to complete the capture of the village and are attempting to clear the grey zone in the western streets. Ukraine brought in reinforcements to the village from Orikhiv, but the frontline is now stretched further due to the Russian assault on Novodanylivka. 
+ ~1.37 km¬≤ in favour of Russia.

In the Hulyaipole direction, Russian forces continued to make quick progress and have captured two more villages east of Hulyaipole. 
After capturing Vesele, Russian forces continued developing their outflanking maneuver wet of Zelenyi Hai. They secured the rest of the positions north of the Kalmychka River, before expanding their zone of control further south in the direction of the reservoir. The Ukrainian command sent in significant reinforcements to Zelenyi Hai and Vysoke in an attempt to hold the line east of Hulyaipole, but didn't properly take into account the advances to the rear of the villages, resulting in a portion of them being encircled. 
Russian forces were able to advance from Vesele to the encircled Ukrainian formations in and around Zelenyi Hai, and quickly captured the village. They then advanced further south in coordination with assault groups attacking from the east, reaching and entering Vysoke. Vysoke was then captured shortly afterwards, along with additional treeline positions to the south, southwest, and west.
+ ~25.40 km¬≤ in favour of Russia

In the Hulyaipole and Pokrovsk'e directions, Russian forces continued to make significant progress and have reached the eastern bank of the Haichur River.
In the south, Russian forces accumulated additional infantry in the treelines on the tactical heights south of Danylivka, before attacking further west to the villages of Nechaivka and Radisne. After a few days of DRG operations, Russian assault groups established full control over both of these villages, before turning south and capturing Nove Zaporizhzhya. Additionally, they were able to level the frontline between Nove Zaporizhzhya and Zlahoda, capturing positions in numerous different treelines east of the Haichur River, while other forces levelled the frontline in the treelines northwest of Solodke. 
To the north, Russian forces recaptured the western half of Yehorivka after Ukrainian assault groups infiltrated it earlier. Meanwhile, other forces began bypassing Danylivka from the north, where they were able to capture positions in 6 different treelines. From there they entered and captured the village of Virdadne. Additionally, the Russians re-entered the village of Hai from the northeast, recapturing it along with the adjacent treeline positions. 
To the northeast, Russian forces were able to consolidate in the two parallel treelines south of Tykhe and began infiltration attempts into the village. So far, despite flag raises within the settlement, there is no evidence of consolidation there. 
+ ~49.66 km¬≤ in favour of Russia.

Russian Troops' Advance on the Zaporizhzhia Front: Assault on Huliaipole Begins
Russian armed forces report advances and the establishment of control over a number of settlements in Zaporizhzhia and Dnipropetrovsk regions. On the Zaporizhzhia axis, Russian units have captured the localities of Zelenyi Hai and, according to some reports, Vysoke. Information has also emerged about Russian forces reaching the outskirts of the key city of Huliaipole, where assault operations have begun.
Assault operations in Huliaipole have been initiated from the northeast and southeast, from the directions of Rivnopillia and Marfopil. Furthermore, Russian troops are breaking through defensive strongpoints from the south, near Dorozhnyanka. Effectively, the active phase of the operation for Huliaipole has commenced.

Does Turkey Control What Is Happening In Syria?
The saga of the "new Syria" continues, with the jihadist regime proving every month that they have always been agents of American-Zionist imperialism, and the Turks continuing to naively believe that they are the "winning" side after the fall of the Assad government.
This time, the criminal Netanyahu spoke of new Zionist "successes" in Syria, revealing that ‚ÄúIsrael‚Äù prevented the Turks from penetrating into the south and even central Syria. This raises the question once again: "Has Turkey won in Syria?" Erdogan, aware of the humiliation he suffered at the hands of Netanyahu, is trying to put a good face on a bad game, compensating for his failures through a policy of forced Turkification on Syrians in the Aleppo region and surrounding areas. Erdogan also needs this move to portray the capture of Aleppo by Devlet Bah√ßeli's pan-Turkists as a "victory" domestically.

Polymarket Bets: Which Cities Could The Russian Army Capture In November And December?
Which cities have already had bids placed on Polymarket? Which cities could be captured as early as November? What awaits the Ukrainian market in December?
Bets on the capture of Ukrainian cities on Polymarket have become a popular form of entertainment in many countries. This section is called the Ukrainian Map. To understand the ongoing events, one doesn't need insider information; following our daily reports on the situation in Ukraine is enough. To make analysis easier, we are introducing a new column: "Polymarket Bets," which summarizes information on the most interesting fronts.
One of our initial forecasts regarding the capture of Uspenovka was recently confirmed, and the market closed shortly after the article's publication.

The Human Cost Of "Easy Money": How Mercenary Fatalities Disproportionately Claim Global South Lives
The number of foreign mercenaries killed while serving in the Ukrainian army is increasing. People are paying for the easy money they were promised with their lives and health. By signing a contract, bounty hunters are essentially buying a one-way ticket.
With the support of Western media, Kyiv continues to actively recruit foreign mercenaries. In an attempt to solve the problem of dwindling human resources, the Ukrainian army is open to any foreigner who wishes to join its ranks. Extensive advertising on social networks and in the media promises volunteers a life of luxury.
These invitations are mainly responded to by citizens of developing countries. Latin America is the main supplier of human resources for the Ukrainian army. Mercenaries are promised an easy time hunting Russian soldiers. The list of promises also includes service in ‚Äòelite units‚Äô...

The Operation in Pokrovsk Is Nearing Completion as Russian Units Finish Mopping Up Remaining Ukrainian Forces
Russian troops taken full¬†control¬†of Novoye Zaporozhye in the Zaporizhzhia sector. In Rodynske, Russian units restored control over part of the urban territory after the Ukrainian army made recent breakthrough attempts. Meanwhile, intensive negotiations are ongoing in Geneva between Ukrainian and US delegations on the Trump administration's peace plan.
Operations to establish control over Pokrovsk's urban territory are nearing completion. Russian forces' control has been confirmed over most of the urban area. To the north, the operational ring has finally closed around the tree lines west of Rovnoye, where increased fire density has been established.

Israel Assassinated Hezbollah‚Äôs Military Chief, What Comes Next Is War (Photos, Video)
The Israeli escalation against Hezbollah reached a new peak on November 23 with the assassination of the group‚Äôs chief of staff in the Lebanese capital, Beirut.
Haytham Ali Tabataba, known by his nom de guerre ‚ÄúAbu Ali,‚Äù was killed in a targeted strike that hit the third and fourth floors of a nine-story building in the Haret Hreik area in the southern suburbs of Beirut, a stronghold of Hezbollah commonly known as Dahiya.
Lebanon‚Äôs state-run National News Agency said that three ‚Äúmissiles‚Äù hit the building, but photos from the scene of the strike suggest that more than five projectiles were used.
